p: Data was analyzed using Stata® 15 statistical program (College Station, Texas 77845 USA). The normality test was first applied through the Shapiro–Wilk test. To perform the bivariate analysis, the Student t test and analysis of variance (ANOVA) were used for multiple comparisons, and thus obtain a prospective result of a before and after. The level of statistical significance used was P < 0.05.
